People with secret should be subject to drug tests

Source: R/gss_vars_572.R
testdrug.Rd

testdrug

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question Protecting secrets is a continuing concern of the government. I am going to ask you about various security measures that the government might apply to individuals with a SECRET of TOP SECRET clearance. Do you strongly agree, agree, neither agree nor disagree, disagree, or strongly disagree that people with SECRET or TOP SECRET clearance should be subject to... B. Random drug tests

Values

  • [1] strongly agree

  • [2] agree

  • [3] neither agree nor disagree

  • [4] disagree

  • [5] strongly disagree

  • [NA(d)] don't know [NA(i)] iap [NA(j)] I don't have a job [NA(m)] dk, na, iap [NA(n)] no answer [NA(p)] not imputable [NA(r)] refused [NA(s)] skipped on web [NA(u)] uncodeable [NA(x)] not available in this release [NA(y)] not available in this year [NA(z)] see codebook

Question Years and Ballots

ballotsyears
A/B/C1998, 2000

Overview

For further details see the GSS Data Explorer page for testdrug.
